H

HaDataSource<T extends FailoverActivator> - Class in pl.touk.hades
A data source which offers high-availability (HA) by enclosing two real data sources - the main one and the failover one.
HaDataSource() - Constructor for class pl.touk.hades.HaDataSource
 
HaDataSourceMBean - Interface in pl.touk.hades
An interface implemented by HaDataSource that enables jmx access to the data source.

L

LoadFailoverActivator - Class in pl.touk.hades.load
A failover activator that activates failover when the main data source is overloaded in comparison to the failover data source.

LoadHaDataSource - Class in pl.touk.hades.load
A HaDataSource whose failover activator is of type LoadFailoverActivator.

Pins the main data source.
pinMainDataSource() - Method in interface pl.touk.hades.HaDataSourceMBean
 
pl.touk.hades - package pl.touk.hades
Provides a HA (high-availability) data source.
pl.touk.hades.load - package pl.touk.hades.load
Provides HA data source that switches between the two contained data sources (the main one and the failover one) on the basis of their load levels comparison.
